prime.core.traits.IQueueingInvalidatable

type
interface
extends
IInvalidatable
subclasses
prime.layout.ILayoutClient
available in
swf
Interface for invalidatable objects which can wait with dispatching their changes until the flag 'validatable' is set to true

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

changes(default,null) : Int

bitflag with all the changes that have happened to the invalidatable object.

invalidatable(default,null) : Bool

Flag indicating if the object should broadcast an invalidate call or do nothing with it.

invalidated(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal2<Int, IInvalidatable>

inherited from prime.core.traits.IInvalidatable
List with IInvalidatables that want to be notified when values in this instance changes

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

dispose() : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IDisposable

invalidate(change : Int) : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IInvalidatable

invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : IInvalidatable) : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IInvalidateListener

resetValidation() : Void

Method to set the invalidatable flag to true and reset the 'changes' flags to '0'.
